pageContext.claim: “You saw a month ago when the drug companies rose their prices very substantially and I said, ‘Get me the name of the head of Pfizer and Novartis,’ and I made some calls. And they immediately dropped their price.”
pageContext.analysis: Pfizer did agree to a brief pause but then announced it would raise prices on 41 prescription drugs as planned at the start of 2019. They did not drop their prices.
